item.description: From time to time I donate objects to cultural institutions…

item.title: Archives: Fostering collection development through citizen participation
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: Archives are institutions of cultural memory - some more, some less…

item.title: Donation to the archive of the Spandau City History Museum
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: After the successful search for Fritz Neumann AKA Ric, it was time to make his work better known in Spandau. As a starting point, I donated a graphic to the archive of the Spandau City History Museum.

item.title: The mystery about Ric is solved
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)

item.title: 911TV as desktop application

item.description: I had some time, since I was ill:

item.title: 911TV started
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: An old idea of mine has now been realised:

item.title: Donation to the city archive Halle
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: Another donation to an archive should have arrived by now in city archives of Halle an der Saale. It concerns three postcards, the outlets of the Stadtgut Gimritz.

item.title: Exhibition "Wilma Bräuner"
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: From December 6, the exhibition “Spurensuche im Sylter Archiv - Zum Leben und Werk von Wilma Bräuner (1891 - 1985)”, on which Evelyn Kraßmann and I worked together with a team, will take place in the city gallery “Alte Post”, Stephanstraße 4, Sylt / OT Westerland. As part of the preparations for the exhibition we have created a Wikipedia entry, the website is still under construction…
